text: alam tara ila alladhina nuhu ʿani l-najwa thumma yaʿuduna lima nuhu ʿanhu wayatanajawna bil-ith'mi wal-ʿud'wani wamaʿsiyati l-rasuli wa-idha jauka hayyawka bima lam yuhayyika bihi l-lahu wayaquluna fi anfusihim lawla yuʿadhibuna l-lahu bima naqulu hasbuhum jahannamu yaslawnaha fabi'sa l-masiru
